title: Chinese Carriers Japan Service Update – 20NOV25
content: 2nd update published at 1930PST 20NOV25 / 0230GMT 21NOV25 (Spring Airlines update)Published at 0400PST / 1200GMT 20NOV25Various Chinese carriers this week gradually begin adjusting service to Japan, due to recent event, resulting in closure of reservations. Information as of 1000GMT 20NOV25, based on GDS availability listing, as well as individual airline’s website, and local Chinese mobile app. Discrepancies between international and Chinese listing are possible, despiteAeroRoutesensured the accuracy at time of research.鉴于中日近期关系紧张，中国大陆各航司于本周开始陆续关闭局部中日航班的订位. 以下各航司的航班调整或航班开放订座状态为截至25年11月20日格林威治时间1000.AeroRoutes在整理以下资料时以国际使用的订座系统为依据，并和各航司的中国大陆网站和中国大陆的部分移动应用程序做比对，即便如此，仍不排除会有疏漏或者资讯详述不精确的情形发生。9 AirThe airline’s service to Japan consists of 3 weeklyGuangzhou – Linyi – Osaka Kansaiand 4 weeklyGuangzhou – Osaka Kansaiflights. Various dates are not available for reservations, whichAeroRoutesis unable to conclude the pattern (九元航空的资料有限，无法根据航班订座开放与否的状态做结论)Air ChinaBeijing Capital – Sapporo New Chitose09DEC25 – 07MAR264 weekly flights maintained as planned increase to 7 weekly cancelled. Planned A330-300 service on selected flights on/after 19DEC25, instead of 737-800, remains unchangedChongqing – Tokyo Naritaeff 01DEC25Reduce from 7 to 4 weekly, 737-800Shanghai Pu Dong – Fukuoka03FEB26 – 24MAR26Reduce from 7 to 6 weekly, A321 (Air China currently schedules 6 weekly flights. Planned 7th weekly from 03FEB26 cancelled)Shanghai Pu Dong – Osaka Kansaieff 30NOV25Reduce from 21 to 16 weekly, A321Air China on its Japanese website disclosed its planned service reductions. 中国国际航空日本网站有列载航班调整资讯。Beijing Capital AirlinesBeijing Daxing – Sapporo New Chitose09DEC25 – 03MAR26Seasonal 3 weekly service closed for bookingsHangzhou – Osaka Kansai14DEC25 – 23DEC253 weekly closed for bookingsChina EasternBeijing Daxing – Osaka Kansaieff 01DEC256 of 14 weekly closed for bookingsChengdu Tianfu – Osaka Kansaieff 01DEC254 weekly closed for bookingsNanchang – Osaka Kansaieff 03DEC251 of 3 weekly closed for bookingsNanjing – Tokyo Naritaeff 02DEC252 of 7 weekly closed for bookings (3 of 7 weekly closed for bookings from 10JAN26)Wuhan – Osaka Kansaieff 02DEC253 of 7 weekly closed for bookingsXi’An – Nagoya01DEC25 – 05JAN262 of 4 weekly closed for bookings (no flights scheduled from 06JAN26)Yantai – Tokyo Naritaeff 04DEC251 of 3 weekly closed for bookingsJuneyao AirlinesBeijing Daxing – Osaka Kansaieff 30NOV251 of 2 daily closed for bookings, A320 operatingChangsha – Osaka Kansaieff 30NOV253 weekly A320 closed for bookingsNanjing – Kobeeff 02DEC253 weekly A320closed for bookingsShanghai Pu Dong – Sapporo New Chitose12DEC25 – 01MAR26Planned 2nd daily flight during this period is closed for reservationWuxi – Osaka Kansaieff 01DEC251 daily A320neo closed for bookingsJuneyao Airline schedules up to 114 weekly one-way flights from China to Japan, the number of flights closed for bookings accounts approximate 24%. 吉祥航空在冬春季航班时刻里，中日航线最多每周飞航114班 (单向)，目前已停止接受订座的航班比例约24%。Loong AirHangzhou – Osaka Kansai01DEC25 – 31DEC251 daily A320 closed for bookingsShenzhen AirlinesYuncheng – Nagoyaeff 01JAN264 weekly flights only available for bookings at highest fare (J / G / Y-class)深圳航空的运城 – 名古屋航线， 26年1月1日到3月28日的航班只开放最高票价仓等订座Spring AirlinesDalian – Fukuokaeff 28NOV251 weekly closed for bookings (The airline will now operate 1 flight only on 21NOV25 for winter season)Shanghai Pu Dong – Okinawaeff 20DEC252nd daily closed for bookings. Note existing 1 daily flight is currently showing lowest available fare starting at JPY42960 until 03DEC25, JPY40820 for 04DEC25 – 23FEB26, JPY17210 for 24FEB26 – 25MAR26.AeroRoutesis unable to determine the status for this route due to higher fares in Dec/JanShanghai Pu Dong – Sapporo New Chitose01DEC25 – 08MAR26Planned 2nd daily flight closed for bookings春秋航空的上海浦东 – 冲绳航线，春秋日本网站的单程显示票价偏高。以上海出发为例， 即日起到12月3日显示最低价单程日币42960， 12月4日到2月23日期间显示最低价单程日币40820， 2月24日到3月25日最低价单程日币17210。AeroRoutes目前无法针对此航线的状态做结论。Edit: as of 1930PST 20NOV25 / 0230GMT 21NOV25, Spring Airlines’ service between Shanghai and Okinawa is now showing lowest available one-way fares starting at JPY25800 for most dates until 23FEB26.补充: 截至11月21日格林威治时间0230， 春秋航空的上海浦东 – 冲绳航线到2月23日前大部分日期列载上海出发的单程最低价位， 已经调整为日币25800起。Tianjin AirlinesTianjin – Osaka Kansaieff 27NOV254 of 7 weekly closed for bookingsTianjin – Tokyo Hanedaeff 01DEC252 of 4-5 weekly available for reservationsReported earlier this week, Sichuan Airlines hasremovedits planned service resumption ofChengdu Tianfu – Sapporo New Chitoseroute, previously scheduled 3 weekly from 02JAN26.

title: Norwegian Schedules Regular Boeing 737 MAX Svalbard Service in NW25
content: Published at 2000PDT 10OCT25 / 0300GMT 11OCT25Norwegian during Northern winter 2025/26 season plans operational aircraft changes to Svalbard, as the airline schedules Boeing 737 MAX 8 aircraft on regular scheduled basis forOslo – Tromsø – Longyearbyenroute. The scheduling of regular 737 MAX service sees this route become the world’s northernmost 737 MAX regular scheduled service during Northern winter 2025/26 season.From 29OCT25, 737 MAX 8 is scheduled on 1 of 4 weekly service, operating on Wednesdays.DY396 OSL0700 – 0855TOS0945 – 1125LYR 73H 7DY396 OSL0920 – 1115TOS1200 – 1340LYR 73H 5DY396 OSL1050 – 1245TOS1330 – 1510LYR 7M8 3DY396 OSL1110 – 1305TOS1350 – 1530LYR 73H 1DY397 LYR1210 – 1345TOS1445 – 1645OSL 73H 7DY397 LYR1425 – 1600TOS1700 – 1900OSL 73H 5DY397 LYR1555 – 1730TOS1830 – 2030OSL 7M8 3DY397 LYR1615 – 1750TOS1850 – 2050OSL 73H 1From 12JAN26 to 28MAR26, 737 MAX 8 also operates on Day 1, while service on Friday 20FEB26 will also see 737 MAX operating.The Northernmost 737 MAX 8 route scheduled on regular basis in Northern summer 2025 season is Alaska Airlines’Anchorage – Utqiaġvik (Barrow)route, previously reported onAeroRouteson13MAR25(schedules listed in the post has since seen various revision, andUtqiaġvik (Barrow)will see one-time 737 MAX 8 service on 14DEC25 for winter season only).Prudhoe Bay/Deadhorsewill maintain the title of the second Northernmost 737 MAX destination at least until 06JAN26, with both regular and charter flights operated by Alaska Airlines 737 MAX 9.

title: Hawaiian NW25 Systemwide Flight Number Changes Update
content: Published at 0900PDT / 1600GMT 08OCT25Hawaiian Airlines in recent month accelerated planned systemwide flight number changes, scheduled to commence in late-October 2025.Following international routes previously scheduled to see flight number changes from 12FEB26 (previously reported onAeroRouteson17MAR25), will now commence on 26OCT25.Honolulu – AucklandHA445/446 > HA845/846Honolulu – Osaka KansaiHA449/450 > HA849/850Honolulu – Pago PagoHA465/466 > HA865/866Honolulu – Papeete (Tahiti)HA481/482 > HA881/882Honolulu – RarotongaHA495/496 > HA895/896Honolulu – Seoul IncheonHA460/461 > HA860/861Honolulu – SydneyHA451/452 > HA851/852Honolulu – Tokyo HanedaHA457/458 > HA831/832With this adjustment, all Hawaiian Airlines’ operating flights will be re-numbered to HA800-1299 series from 26OCT25. The following flight number changes was previously reported on 17MAR25.Honolulu – US MainlandHA0xx > HA8xx (selected exceptions apply, including certain Portland OR, San Diego and Seattle service also operates under HA9xx)Kahului – US MainlandHA0xx > HA9xxKona – US MainlandHA0xx > HA9xxLihue – US MainlandHA0xx > HA9xxIntra-HawaiiNew flight number range HA1000 – 1299, instead of 3-digitHilo – KahuluiHA1019/1129Honolulu – HiloHA1002/1001, HA1012/1011…etcHonolulu – KahuluiHA1006/1005, HA1016/1015…etcHonolulu – KonaHA1008/1007, HA1018/1017…etcHonolulu – LihueHA1003/1004, HA1013/1014…etcKahului – LihueHA1049/1040, HA1159/1150, HA1269/1260Kona – KahuluiHA1039/1030, HA1149/1140, HA1259/1250Kona – LihueHA1029/1120Certain routes  not listed above will continue to operate under HA8xx flight numbers. The airline recently announced all Hawaiian Airlines service will transition to Alaska Airlines’ AS-coded flight numbers during 14OCT25’s schedule update, for travel on/after 22APR26. Hawaiian Airline’ HA code will be discontinued.Alaska Airlines earlier this year also reassigned flight numbers on selected routes to Hawaii, for travel on/after 26OCT25.

title: Delta Discontinues New York – Geneva Service in late-Oct 2025
content: Published at 2100PDT 24SEP25 / 0400GMT 25SEP25Delta in the last few days filed changes toNew York JFK – Genevaroute, where the airline closed reservations for all flights in 2026, effective 13APR26. As a result, the airline schedules last flight on 19OCT25, New York departure.The Skyteam member previously schedules 1 daily flight from 13APR26 for Northern summer 2026 season.DL100 JFK2050 – 1045+1GVA 76W DDL099 GVA1245 – 1545JFK 76W DDelta first operated New York JFK – Brussels – Geneva routing with Airbus A310 in December 1991. The airline recently also announced it is discontinuingNew York JFK – Brusselssector.

title: Saudia Tentatively Moves Riyadh – Kozhikode Service to Dec 2025
content: Published at 0000PDT / 0700GMT 17SEP25Saudia in recent schedule update revised planned service resumption onRiyadh – Kozhikoderoute, despite reservations remain unavailable. The Skyteam member now intends to resume this route on 01DEC25 at earliest, instead of 27OCT25. Saudia would operate 6 weekly flights with Airbus A321neo aircraft.SV712 RUH0120 – 0835CCJ 321 x3SV713 CCJ0945 – 1250RUH 321 x3Saudia last operated this route during Northern summer 2021 season.

title: Qatar Airways Further Adds 11% Capacity For Nairobi in NW25
content: Published at 2000PDT 16SEP25 / 0300GMT 17SEP25Qatar Airways earlier this month further expanded capacity to itsDoha – Nairobiroute during Northern winter 2025/26 season. Previously reported, the 3rd daily service from 15SEP25 is being maintained on/after 26OCT25.Based on recent update, 1 of 3 daily QR1341/1342 service will now see 412-seater 777-300ER operating along with the 354-seater throughout the season, leading to one-way capacity from 26OCT25 to 28MAR26 increases from 126351 seats (as of 31AUG25) to 140189 seats (as of 14SEP25). This represents additional 11% of capacity added.QR1335 DOH0205 – 0715NBO 788 DQR1345 DOH0835 – 1345NBO 359 DQR1341 DOH1855 – 0005+1NBO 77W DQR1342 NBO0135 – 0635DOH 77W DQR1346 NBO0845 – 1345DOH 788 DQR1336 NBO1700 – 2200DOH 359 DPrior to the addition of 3rd daily flight, the airline’s one-way capacity for entire season was showing 87164 seats (as of 15JUN25), which now see 61% capacity increase. Capacity data is based on filings in the OAG as of 14SEP25.
